Help & Documentation

Getting Started

1. Upload Images: Go to the Analysis tab and select your root images (JPG, PNG, etc.)

2. Run Analysis: Click "Predict & Analyze" to process your images

3. Review Results: View the generated masks and ROI visualizations

4. Download Data: Export your results as images or CSV data

Key Features

Image Processing

  • • Multi-image batch processing
  • • Automatic root detection
  • • Mask generation
  • • ROI identification

Interactive Tools

  • • Manual mask editing
  • • ROI drawing tools
  • • Real-time visualization
  • • Image navigation

Troubleshooting

No images processed: Check that your images are in a supported format (JPG, PNG, etc.)

Processing errors: Ensure your images are clear and contain visible root structures

Canvas errors: Try refreshing the page if you encounter display issues

Upload failures: Check your internet connection and try again
